<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Scout](/Feats.aspx?ID=6487) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=595" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 231 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Master in Perception

</column>

---

When you scout, you are particularly alert for danger, granting your allies precious moments to prepare to fight. When using the [Scout](/Actions.aspx?ID=2629) exploration activity, you grant your allies a +2 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls instead of a +1 circumstance bonus.
name: Incredible Scout
